com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui

Class PasscodeActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity

  • public class PasscodeActivity
extends Activity
    Passcode activity: takes care of creating/verifying a user passcode.

      • enableLogout

        public void enableLogout(boolean b)
        Used from tests to allow/disallow automatic logout when wrong passcode has been entered too many times.
        Parameters:
        b - True - if logout is enabled, False - otherwise.

      • forceBiometric

        public void forceBiometric(boolean b)
        Used for tests to allow biometric when the device is not set up
        Parameters:
        b - True - if biometric checks skipped, False - otherwise.
